description: This file defines an 'Intro' component for a LightningJS application, serving as a welcome page for the Ocean Quiz. It includes a visual template with text and elements, and handles user input to navigate to the quiz page.

classes.name: Intro
classes.description: A LightningJS component representing the introductory screen of the quiz application.

methods.name: enter
methods.description: Handles the 'enter' input event, navigating the user to the '/quiz' route.
